sense.gloss: feature of the season, something characteristic of a particular season
poem about natural scenery or a particular season

sdata.j: ↑風鈴↑↓ふうりん↓が↑奏↑↓かな↓でる↑涼↑↓すず↓やかな↑音↑↓おと↓は↑日本↑↓にほん↓の↑夏↑↓なつ↓の↑風物詩↑↓|ふうぶつし|↓の↑一↑↓ひと↓つだが、↑近年↑↓きんねん↓ではただの↑騒音↑↓そうおん↓と↑捉↑↓とら↓える↑人↑↓ひと↓も↑増↑↓ふ↓えている。
sdata.e: The clear and refreshing sound of the wind chimes is one of the characteristics of summers in Japan, but in recent years the number of people who perceive it merely as noise has been increasing.
